SELECT T.* FROM (SELECT @RNUM := @RNUM + 1 AS RNUM, a.* FROM ( SELECT TRANS_SEQ , CONTENT_ID , CONTENT_ID AS CONTENT_TITLE , CAST(REQ_DATETIME AS CHAR) AS REQ_DATETIME , TRANS_STATE , (SELECT CONTENT FROM tb_cmmn_code_sub WHERE CMMN_CODE1 = 'TRANS_STATE' AND CMMN_CODE2 = TRANS_STATE) AS TRANS_STATE_TXT , CAST(COMPLETE_DATETIME AS CHAR) AS COMPLETE_DATETIME FROM tb_transcode_req_log WHERE 1=1
AND TRANS_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{transSeq}, '%')
AND CONTENT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contentId}, '%')
AND CONTENT_TITLE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{contentTitle}, '%')
AND REQ_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqDatetime}, '%')
AND TRANS_STATE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{transState}, '%')
AND COMPLETE_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{completeDatetime}, '%')
ORDER BY TRANS_SEQ ASC ) a, ( SELECT @RNUM := 0 ) b ) T ORDER BY TRANS_SEQ DESC LIMIT #{searchVO.recordCountPerPage} OFFSET #{searchVO.firstIndex}

AND TRANS_SEQ LIKE CONCAT('%', #{transSeq}, '%')

AND REQ_DATETIME LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reqDatetime}, '%')
